name: Dinesh Pandiyan
title: Blog Template

children.text: Hello! Welcome to my blog. This is a template to build your own static blogs using Keystone. Two themes available - sleek and newspaper.

metaTitle: Static Blogs with Keystone | Dinesh Pandiyan
metaDescription: Starter template to build your own static blogs with Keystone. Created by Dinesh Pandiyan.
